messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] History storybooks...
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, I don t unschool, but use Konos.  I suppose I could say I unschool, because we do what ever, whenever! We are using The American Adventure series for
messages.messageBody:
Hello,
I don't unschool, but use Konos. I suppose I could say I unschool, because
we do what ever, whenever!

We are using "The American Adventure" series for history storybooks. They
are great! Look in your CBD catalog. There, they are the cheapest I've
seen.

Theresa from Richmond, Ohio
